--adb-sp-client-key-secret-name.help: Azure Databricks Service Principal client key secret name in Databricks Secrets

--log-analytics-workspace-key-name.help: Log Analytics workspace key secret name

--use-msi-azure-sql-auth.help: Use Managed Service Identity (MSI) to authenticate into AzureSql or use user and password read from KeyVault instead

--export-batch-size.help: Batch size for exporting the data to Azure Sql

--members-group-personal-meetings-file-n.help: Csv file name for members group personal meetings data

--groups-per-weeks-file-name.help: Csv file name for groups per week data

groups-per-day-file-name.help: Csv file name for groups per day data

--members-to-group-participation-file-na.help: Csv file name for members to group participation data

--employee-profile-file-name.help: Csv file name for employee profiles data

--jdbc-user.help: Username for database running on localhost

--jdbc-password.help: Password for database running on localhost
